entities.name: diadem
entities.description: The diadem is mentioned as an object that Ravenclaw's statue is wearing. It is described as something Harry wants to see and has a lead on its location.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is mentioned as the one who is wearing the diadem in her statue. She is not physically present but is represented by her statue.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who wants to see the diadem and has a lead on its location. He is also experiencing visions of Voldemort flying.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who is flying again, whether it's to an underground lake or the castle. Harry sees him in a vision.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who he tells about Voldemort being on the move.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who he tells about Voldemort being on the move.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone who gets up to go with Harry but then sits back down when Ginny suggests Luna take his place.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who suggests that Luna take Harry's place in going to see the statue.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as someone who agrees to go with Harry to see the statue.

relationships.description: Harry has a lead on the location of the diadem and wants to see it.
Ravenclaw's statue is wearing the diadem.
Harry sees Voldemort flying in a vision.
Ginny suggests that Luna take Harry's place in going to see the statue.
Cho wants to go with Harry but then sits back down when Ginny suggests Luna take his place.
Luna agrees to go with Harry to see the statue and the diadem.
